30ea5aec-6f33-42b2-bd5d-f6b9c67455bd.description: Earners of the LLPA - Microsoft Azure Fundamentals: Novice badge has successfully completed instructor-led training in Azure Fundamentals. The course covers the basic concepts and benefits of Azure and cloud computing. This course is suitable for both users and IT professionals or anyone interested in the cloud.
30ea5aec-6f33-42b2-bd5d-f6b9c67455bd.name: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals: Novice

issuer.summary: issued by The Leading Learning Partners Association

badge_template_activities.title: Successful attendance and completion of the LLPA 6-hour Azure Fundamentals instructor-led training course.

b0b26370-a1d4-494f-9379-504c0ad76b3f.description: Earners of this badge attended the C3 Global Cloud Skills v-Tour proudly brought to you by Microsoft, Pearson VUE, Virsoft, The LLPA, and its members. We want to ensure all Microsoft cloud customers learn, implement, and adopt Microsoft technologies and services to achieve success. The aim of this event is for business leaders to gain valuable insights and learn from local/international learning culture experts on how to transform, reboot, and become the Phoenix in their market.
b0b26370-a1d4-494f-9379-504c0ad76b3f.name: Event Attendee: C3 Global Cloud Skills v-Tour 2022 | A Global Broadcast

issuer.summary: issued by The Leading Learning Partners Association

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 4-hour live virtual C3 Global Cloud Skills v-Tour conference.

13b1fb16-3856-43c2-aa4d-fbf8964116ad.description: Earners of the LLPA - Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals: Novice badge has successfully completed instructor-led training in Azure Data Fundamentals. The course covers the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment. Earners of this badge have explored relational data offerings, how to provision and deploy relational databases, and query relational data through cloud data solutions with Microsoft Azure.
13b1fb16-3856-43c2-aa4d-fbf8964116ad.name: Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals: Novice

issuer.summary: issued by The Leading Learning Partners Association

badge_template_activities.title: Successful attendance and completion of the LLPA 6-hour Azure Data Fundamentals instructor-led training course.

06f39b2c-2be6-42d1-8239-0acfa40be519.description: Earners of this badge attended the C3 Global Cloud Skills v-Tour. The LLPA and its members recognize that transformation to cloud technologies requires skills transformation and that digital transformation is all about people. The aim of this event is for IT professionals and business leaders to gain valuable insights and learn from local and international leading industry experts on topics such as building high-performance teams and ways to better leverage existing and future cloud investments.
06f39b2c-2be6-42d1-8239-0acfa40be519.name: Event Attendee: C3 Global Cloud Skills v-Tour 2021 | International Edition

issuer.summary: issued by The Leading Learning Partners Association

badge_template_activities.title: Attend live virtual sessions during the 2-day C3 Global Cloud Skills v-Tour | International Edition.

3cb87d3e-eca8-4049-98d5-dd16997029ae.description: Earners of the LLPA - Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals: Novice badge has successfully completed instructor-led training in Azure AI Fundamentals. The course covers fundamental concepts related to artificial intelligence (AI) and services in Microsoft Azure that can be used to create AI solutions. The course is not designed to teach students to become professional data scientists or software developers, but rather to build awareness of common AI workloads & the ability to identify Azure services.
3cb87d3e-eca8-4049-98d5-dd16997029ae.name: Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals: Novice

issuer.summary: issued by The Leading Learning Partners Association

badge_template_activities.title: Successful attendance and completion of the LLPA 6-hour Azure AI Fundamentals instructor-led training course.

b8e65fe8-ee02-4ecf-a23b-2936fcfbc9cc.description: Earners of the LLPA - Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals: Novice badge has successfully completed instructor-led training in Power Platform Fundamentals. The course teaches users to create simple Power Apps, connect data with Common Data Service, build a Power BI Dashboard, automate a process with Power Automate, and build a chatbot with Power Virtual Agents. This course is suitable for both users and IT professionals or anyone interested in automating business processes.
b8e65fe8-ee02-4ecf-a23b-2936fcfbc9cc.name: Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals: Novice

issuer.summary: issued by The Leading Learning Partners Association

badge_template_activities.title: Successful attendance and completion of the LLPA 6-hour Power Platform Fundamentals instructor-led training course.
